description:
a graphical interface and toolkit for phylogenetic analyses using RAxML.

A new graphical interface for RAxML.

raxmlGUI1,2 is a graphical user interface to RAxML3, one of the most popular and widely used software for phylogenetic inference using maximum likelihood. This is the first public beta of raxmlGUI v2.0, featuring:.

Download v2.0.0-beta.4 for Mac Download v2.0.0-beta.4 for Windows Download v2.0.0-beta.4 for Linux.
